## ThemeLoadOptions.maxInheritanceDepth property

Maximum recursion depth when resolving base themes through \[\[\[Theme\]\]s `extends` property.

 \[\[DEFAULT\_MAX\_THEME\_INTHERITANCE\_DEPTH\]\]

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
maxInheritanceDepth?: number;
```
